title: VOTE: Merseyside v Manchester
text:
VOTE: Merseyside v Manchester - A rivalry beyond football By Sean Fitzpatrick Last Updated: 12/01/17 7:14pm Which is better, Merseyside or Manchester? The Beatles or Oasis? The Cavern Club or The Haçienda? Hair-rollers or bucket hats? The Merseyside v Manchester rivalry extends far beyond football… 
This Super Sunday sees Manchester City travel to Everton before Manchester United host Liverpool in one of the biggest derby matches in world football. 
However, as fans of these four clubs will testify, the north west is divided by more than just the love of their teams. 
Boasting some of the finest musicians, sportspeople and architecture on the planet, both Merseyside and Manchester could lay claim to being the superior neighbour. 
But who do you think has the best to offer? 
Ahead of this Sunday’s hotly-anticipated double-header, cast your votes below to decide which of these football hotbeds deserves the pre-match day bragging rights. 
Watch Merseyside v Manchester live on Sky Sports 1 HD from 12.30pm on Sunday. Also See:
